title: JP Fonts

comments.content:
Sans looks like Today Sans.

Serif is probably a Garamond - don't have time to search right now.

I may be wrong, but it looks like aalsborg (serif)  
Check this site: [http://www.psyops.com/html/spec\_aalborg.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022005421/http:/www.psyops.com/html/spec_aalborg.html "http://www.psyops.com/html/spec\_aalborg.html")
